books.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
books.author: E.L. James
books.description: Fifty Shades of Grey is a novel by British author E. L. James. It is the first instalment in the Fifty Shades trilogy that traces the deepening relationship between a college graduate, Anastasia Steele, and a young business magnate, Christian Grey. It is notable for its explicitly erotic scenes featuring elements of sexual practices involving BDSM (bondage/discipline, dominance/submission, and sadism/masochism).

books.title: My Year of Rest and Relaxation
books.author: Ottessa Moshfegh
books.description: My Year of Rest and Relaxation is a darkly comic novel by Ottessa Moshfegh. It follows a young woman in New York City who decides to take a year off from life, spending most of her days in a medicated haze while trying to achieve a prolonged sleep. The novel explores themes of alienation, depression, and the search for meaning in contemporary society.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic novel that follows the romantic entanglements of the Bennett sisters in Georgian England.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte Brontë
books.description: The story of an orphaned governess who falls in love with her brooding employer, Mr. Rochester, and discovers secrets of his past.

books.title: Wuthering Heights
books.author: Emily Brontë
books.description: A tale of passion, revenge, and the destructive power of love, set in the wild Yorkshire moors.
